wikipedia_page.main: Raymond Herbert Witch (6 October 1927 – 10 December 2009) was an English theatre, motion picture and television actor.

link_mentions.page: List of All Creatures Great and Small (1978–1990 TV series) characters

response: In the 1982 made-for-TV movie version, Mr Sowerberry is portrayed by Philip Locke and three years later by Raymond Witch in another BBC series. In the latter, Sowerberry is pleasantly disposed to Oliver and sees him as a promising apprentice until the incident with Noah Claypole.
